resources.string: Clicking Update button would update the forecast. Otherwise, the marker and all data associated to it will be removed.

You are a ninja to discover this easter egg. Actually, this page only serves one purpose and that is to acknowledge people who helped me along the way. SOOOOOO cheesy... I know... :P But without those people... I won\'t learn as much, produce this much and have something that is aesthetically good not only in my eyes. So yes... enough with all the cheesiness. :D

First and foremost, to those android people who imparted their great knowledge to me... Joice, Jade, Kim, Daryl, Xy, Miguel... And to those who handled the Techfocus... I thank you all. I honestly learned a lot. This project has brought joy and encouragement to me... #CHEESY
To my friends, Niqui and Robbie. For giving comments on my poor aesthetics... I thank you very much. :)
Lastly, of course to MBK!!! For our wonderful logo.
Thank you very much everyone. It is not that much but I dedicate this page to you. :)
